scene_description_enriched: The Virgin Mary, depicted with a halo and wearing a blue robe, is seated on a throne draped with an ornate orange fabric. She holds the Christ Child on her lap, who is also haloed. The Virgin Mary gazes down at the child and holds a red flower. Above them, an angel with red wings, also haloed, places a crown on the Virgin Mary's head. The background features a patterned textile, and the foreground is a green, tessellated ground. This scene represents the Coronation of the Virgin Mary, a devotional image emphasizing her role as Queen of Heaven.
